trans-unit.source: Apache MXNet is a deep learning framework designed for both efficiency and flexibility. It allows you to mix the flavours of deep learning programs together to maximize the efficiency and your productivity.
trans-unit.target: Apache MXNet是一个旨在提高效率和灵活性的深度学习框架。它使您可以将深度学习程序的各种风格混合在一起，以最大程度地提高效率和生产率。

trans-unit.source: For feature requests on the PyPI package, suggestions, and issue reports, create an issue by clicking here.
trans-unit.target: 对于PyPI软件包上的功能请求，建议和问题报告，请单击此处创建问题 。

trans-unit.source: MXNet is an ultra-scalable deep learning framework. This version uses CUDA-8.0 and MKLDNN.
trans-unit.target: MXNet是一个超可扩展的深度学习框架。这个版本使用CUDA-8.0和MKLDNN。

trans-unit.source: This package supports Linux and Windows platforms. You may also want to check: - mxnet-cu92 with CUDA-9.2 support. - mxnet-cu92mkl with CUDA-9.2 support and MKLDNN support. - mxnet-cu91 with CUDA-9.1 support. - mxnet-cu91mkl with CUDA-9.1 support and MKLDNN support. - mxnet-cu90 with CUDA-9.0 support. - mxnet-cu90mkl with CUDA-9.0 support and MKLDNN support. - mxnet-cu80 with CUDA-8.0 support. - mxnet-cu75 with CUDA-7.5 support. - mxnet-cu75mkl with CUDA-7.5 support and MKLDNN support. - mxnet-mkl with MKLDNN support. - mxnet.
trans-unit.target: 该软件包支持Linux和Windows平台。您可能还需要检查：-具有CUDA-9.2支持的mxnet-cu92。 - 具有CUDA-9.2支持和MKLDNN支持的mxnet-cu92mkl。 - 具有CUDA-9.1支持的mxnet-cu91。 - 具有CUDA-9.1支持和MKLDNN支持的mxnet-cu91mkl。 - 具有CUDA-9.0支持的mxnet-cu90。 - 具有CUDA-9.0支持和MKLDNN支持的mxnet-cu90mkl。 - 具有CUDA-8.0支持的mxnet-cu80。 - 具有CUDA-7.5支持的mxnet-cu75。 - 具有CUDA-7.5支持和MKLDNN支持的mxnet-cu75mkl。 - 具有MKLDNN支持的mxnet-mkl。 - mxnet。

trans-unit.source: To download CUDA, check CUDA download. For more instructions, check CUDA Toolkit online documentation.
trans-unit.target: 要下载CUDA，请检查CUDA download。有关更多说明，请参阅CUDA Toolkit在线文档。

trans-unit.source: To install for other platforms (e.g. Windows, Raspberry Pi/ARM) or other versions of CUDA, check Installing MXNet for instructions on building from source.
trans-unit.target: 要为其他平台（例如Windows，Raspberry Pi / ARM）或其他版本的CUDA安装，请检查“安装MXNet” 以获取有关从源代码进行构建的说明。
